name: Inner Peak AI
description: For high schools and colleges struggling to support students' mental health needs with limited resources, Peak blends the best of AI and world-class therapist expertise through video content to provide 24/7 personalized mental wellness support for students and critical insights and initiative tracking for schools
one_liner: For high schools and colleges struggling to support students' mental health needs with limited resources, Peak blends the best of AI and world-class therapist expertise through video content to provide 24/7 personalized mental wellness support for students and critical insights and initiative tracking for schools
